unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Gets a Desi Twist!**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing follower analytics gets a desi twist

unnormalised: Hey Influencers! Feeling the Onam vibes but also wondering where your followers are *really* from? New follower analytics are here, and they’re getting super localized. Forget just state-level data; we’re talking city-specific insights!
normalised: hey influencers feeling the onam vibes but also wondering where your followers are really from new follower analytics are here and they are getting super localized forget just state-level data we are talking city-specific insights

unnormalised: Platforms are rolling out features that tell you if your followers are from, say, Connaught Place, Delhi, or maybe chilling near Marine Drive, Mumbai. Think targeting your biryani recipe video to the Hyderabad crowd for max engagement!
normalised: platforms are rolling out features that tell you if your followers are from say connaught place delhi or maybe chilling near marine drive mumbai think targeting your biryani recipe video to the hyderabad crowd for maximum engagement

unnormalised: Early reports suggest these analytics are a game-changer, offering a deeper understanding of audience demographics than ever before. Imagine knowing how many of your "Desi Girl" dance routine viewers are actually students from IIT Madras. Crazy, right?
normalised: early reports suggest these analytics are a game-changer offering a deeper understanding of audience demographics than ever before imagine knowing how many of your desi girl dance routine viewers are actually students from I I T madras crazy right

unnormalised: Brands like Amul are already rumored to be using this info to tailor their regional campaigns. So, keep an eye out and get ready to dive deep into the data. Level up your influencer game, folks! And Happy Onam!
normalised: brands like amul are already rumored to be using this info to tailor their regional campaigns so keep an eye out and get ready to dive deep into the data level up your influencer game folks and happy onam
